content: tail before attaching the feet and tail to the body fill them in with some polyfill the feet and tail are not symmetrical and when folded in half one side is wider the wider part should point upward both for the feet and for the tail arms before attaching the arms to the body fill them in with some polyfill as the feet the arms are not symmetrical when attaching them to the body make sure that the wider part points upwards in this way the hands should also be pointing slightly up front arms and feet ©beckysaurusrebs/rebecaquintero allrightsreserved thepatternandtheimagesinthisdocumentarepropertyofbeckysaurusrebs donotsellthis pattern donotsellanyproductsmadefromthispattern idonotownthecharacter makarbelongs tonintendo 5 side tail leaf details sew or glue the details of the leaf before attaching the leaf to the body ©beckysaurusrebs/rebecaquintero allrightsreserved thepatternandtheimagesinthisdocumentarepropertyofbeckysaurusrebs donotsellthis pattern donotsellanyproductsmadefromthispattern idonotownthecharacter makarbelongs tonintendo 6 leaf as the final step attach the leaf to the body do not sew the borders of the leaf instead i give a few stitches between the 3rd and 4th row of the leaf to attach to the body and one more at the base of the stem that way the border of the leaf is separated from the body and looks more like a leaf that makar is wearing ©beckysaurusrebs/rebecaquintero allrightsreserved thepatternandtheimagesinthisdocumentarepropertyofbeckysaurusrebs donotsellthis pattern donotsellanyproductsmadefromthispattern idonotownthecharacter makarbelongs tonintendo 7 thank you very much for downloading and enjoy your own makar ©beckysaurusrebs/rebecaquintero allrightsreserved thepatternandtheimagesinthisdocumentarepropertyofbeckysaurusrebs donotsellthis pattern donotsellanyproductsmadefromthispattern idonotownthecharacter makarbelongs tonintendo 8
